org.apache.flink.api.java.utils

类 Option

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.java.utils.Option

  • @PublicEvolving
public class Option
extends java.lang.Object
    Internal representation of a parameter passed to a user defined function.

    • 字段概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • alt

        public Option alt(java.lang.String shortName)
        Define an alternative / short name of the parameter. Only one alternative per parameter is allowed.
        参数:
        shortName - - short version of the parameter name
        返回:
        the updated Option

      • type

        public Option type(OptionType type)
        Define the type of the Option.
        参数:
        type - - the type which the value of the Option can be casted to.
        返回:
        the updated Option

      • defaultValue

        public Option defaultValue(java.lang.String defaultValue)
                    throws RequiredParametersException
        Define a default value for the option.
        参数:
        defaultValue - - the default value
        返回:
        the updated Option
        抛出:
        RequiredParametersException - if the list of possible values for the parameter is not empty and the default value passed is not in the list.

      • choices

        public Option choices(java.lang.String... choices)
               throws RequiredParametersException
        Restrict the list of possible values of the parameter.
        参数:
        choices - - the allowed values of the parameter.
        返回:
        the updated Option
        抛出:
        RequiredParametersException

      • help

        public Option help(java.lang.String helpText)
        Add a help text, explaining the parameter.
        参数:
        helpText - - the help text.
        返回:
        the updated Option
